entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet/announcements best practices #229
  • `System.Drawing.Common` will only be supported on Windows #228

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • profiler/elt/slowpatheltenter crash on macOS when SIGWINCH signal is received #71409
  • SslSessionsCache growth on Linux with MTLS using many client certificates #71401
  • Cross-Architecture publish user experience should be better #71395
  • Wasm-tools installation fails for preview 5 complaining about unsigned Emscripten package #71391
  • ConfigurationBuilder.AddJsonFile can't fire OnChange event using relative paths #71386
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ColdStartSerialization<SimpleStructWithProperties> #71392
  • `ArgsComplete` still doesn't spill all non-morphable multi-reg nodes #71375
    7.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.AesGcm - decryption allows truncated tags #71366
  • HttpListenerResponse: Unhandled exception. System.ObjectDisposedException #71364
  • Generate "trimmed" assembly using NativeAOT #71363
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Align System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.DllCharacteristics with PE spec #71362

Closed

  • Installer-related classes missing #29643
    Future
  • [HTTP/2] RTT pings shutting down connection in gRPC CI - regression in .NET 6 #62216
    7.0.0
  • Determine whether RegexOptions.NonBacktracking should capture all loop iterations #69040
    7.0.0
  • Experiment with inverting Regex scan loop #62443
    7.0.0
  • How should source-build handle the removal of System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe package in .NET 7.0 #71396
  • [Ignore: Testing issue-labeler] System.Xml.Ling.XElement.Parse #71400
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/23/2022 10:48:42 PM #70027
    7.0.0
  • [JIT] Update loop integrity checks #71084
    7.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] SIGSEGV in libclrjit.so!Compiler::optMarkLoopRemoved(unsigned int) #71071
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.IOException : Unable to read data from the transport connection: 'overlapped' was not allocated by this ThreadPoolBoundHandle instance. (Parameter 'overlapped'). #70713
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Vector128\\Vector128_r\\Vector128_r.cmd #71360
    7.0.0
  • Grpc bidirectional streaming doesn't work with WinHttpHandler. #71093
    7.0.0
  • Fix ConnectTest.ConnectAsync_CancellationRequested**Connect_ThrowsOperationCanceledException on NodeJS #63672
    7.0.0
  • Memory dump of AccessViolationException on gc_heap::mark_object_simple and heap corruption #65694
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: RuntimeHelpers.GetAssemblyFromRvaSpan API #71268
  • QUIC: Hang when calling WriteAsync many times in a loop #71370
    7.0.0
  • .Net Core Directory.GetFiles() operates webDav path #46723
    Future
  • Analyzer proposal: specify default parameter values; remove arguments that match defaults #57549
    Future
  • QUIC: SHUTDOWN_INITIATED_BY_TRANSPORT on connection should not result in QuicOperationAbortedException #55157
    7.0.0
  • Application Hang and Stops responding to API calls #71320
  • Developers can use System.Text.Json to serialize type hierarchies securely #63747
    7.0.0
  • Arm64: Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8ParserTests #69561
    7.0.0
  • Password character display on console with Console.ReadKey(true) #66829
  • [NativeAOT] Minor consistency b/w coreclr and nativeaot (Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable()) #71367
  • Runtime type loader support for static abstract interface methods #67745
    7.0.0
  • LoadGdipImageFromStream failed #65510
    7.0.0
  • BasicThreading test seg fault in Build Linux x64 release NativeAOT #64060
    7.0.0
  • System.Drawing.Common.Tests fail many test in VS with "Unable to load DLL 'libgdiplus' or one of its dependencies" #59326
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Data Contract Serializer #71350
  • System.Reflection.PortableExecutable: IMAGE_DLL_CHARACTERISTICS_GUARD_CF missing from DLLCharacteristics enum #71354

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for GetPinnableReference for the new marshaller shapes #71412
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • MonoAOTCompilerTask: Don't check for temp file if cache is disabled #71411
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix OSX thread_set_state calls in CONTEXT_SetThreadContextOnPort #71410
    os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Morph tree before making an unused value for cse hoisting #71407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove stale CA1419 suppressions #71406
  • Refactoring IShiftOperators to take a `TOther` #71405
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Exclude root folder's .md files as well from triggering CI #71404
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update rollback link for Maui workload install #71403
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Consolidate Newtonsoft versions #71402
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Do not spill "mis-sized" struct args passed on stack #71399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable ConnectWithRevocation_StapledOcsp on RHEL and CentOS 7 #71397
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add an Azure NPM registry #71393
    area-Infrastructure
  • S.S.C.Cose: Add new MultiSign APIs and address API review feedback on existing ones #71390
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Fix: using default value for nullable enum parameter throws ArgumentException #71388
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] test case for broken .locals init #71387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [Android] Fix some System.Net.Security tests #71385
    area-System.Net.Security
  • #71252 disable Atan2PiTest on Android x86 #71382
    os-android, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Add MaybeNullWhen attribute to IParsable.TryParse / ISpanParsable.TryParse #71381
    community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Spill non-morphable split args on non-ARM targets #71380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix loading NPM packages on NodeJS tests #71377
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Improve interoperability of NTLM encryption/decryption and authentication #71373
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • #36836 enable test on android #71371
    area-System.IO
  • Add a config to MIBC format #71359
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • Update to use CustomMarshaller entry point type #71398
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Remove unnecessary DynamicDependency in CoreLib #71369
    area-System.Reflection, linkable-framework
  • Update guideline of squashing commits #71394
    area-Meta
  • JIT: strengthen checking of the loop table #71184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid incorrect TYP_UINT retyping for ToScalar #71372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add Vector128.OnesComplement SIMD intrinsic #71384
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: add missing test case for gdv and boxing #71389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use null coalescing in many more places #71361
    area-Meta
  • Enable IDE0170 (Simplify property pattern) and IDE0200 (remove unnecessary lambda expression) #71011
    area-Meta
  • Add test coverage for generic type substitution with byreflike generics #71276
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update ValueStringBuilder grow logic #70942
  • Rename nightly to daily in the dogfood instructions #71383
    area-Meta
  • Simplify instructions for using ILC #70811
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1849263 #71365
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Annotate collections.specialized to be native aot compatible #71159
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Rewire polymorphism metadata to the contract model #71346
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [GDBJIT] Fix "section extending past end of file" warning #69124
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Type loader support for static virtual methods #71321
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Move macOS remote unwinding to libunwind directory #69720
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement Tar async APIs #70574
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable AES encryption on Browser WASM #70915
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Disable HANDLER_ENTRY_MUST_BE_IN_HOT_SECTION #71273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added a new method to the GC API to Get the GC Configurations #70514
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Recognize the stateful marshaller shape #71355
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Adjust regions range dynamically based on memory limits #71164
    area-GC-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Allow double constants to CSE more often #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Adding AllBitsSet to IBinaryNumber Interface #71356
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: fix double reporting of some GC frame slots #71245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add CET pipeline #71223
  • Try adding armv8-a+lse #71260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix crossgen2 version resilience test #71357
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Improve allocations in NegotiateStreamPal #71280
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn. #70911
  • Exposing static bool IsSupported { get; } on Vector<T> and Vector64/128/256<T> #71240
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Refactor wasmappbuilder's System.Text.Json reference to use a versions.props property #70582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Delete dead code #71351
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • PipeReaderStream.ReadInternal throws AggregateException unexpectedly #70248
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][nodejs] Fix console template running with node, to always flush the output stream before exit #70704
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable hot/cold splitting of EH funclets #71236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm-mt] Add MessageChannel between browser thread and new pthreads #70908
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix all remaining C4018 warnings and enable the check during build #71269
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add ProcessorCount Event to RuntimeEventSource #65581
    area-System.Diagnostics, 7.0.0
  • Support top-level statements in regex analyzer #71264
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Relax Socket.EnableBroadcast getter exception behavior #70728
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Pass CancellationToken to Http2Connection SetupAsync #70906
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Various cryptographic allocation improvements #71015
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Preparation for public API in System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript #71332
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix race condition between GCInfo and Rundown #70609
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Avoid transformation from multiplication to left shift in case of 64 bit value #71189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix leaking mach ports & memory after task_threads() #70338
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Avoid a linear search in the GENERICPARAMCONSTRAINT table, its… #71349
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement HttpProtocolException for HTTP/2 #71345
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Check layout compatibility before morphing `OBJ(ADDR(LCL_VAR))` into a list of promoted fields #71348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Use GenericArraySortHelper<T> on mono as well. #71325
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thunks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to check if the current invocation is running `publish`? #26324
  • The " GenerateDepsFile" Task failed unexpectedly #26315
  • "DebugType" ignored when packing under "Release" configuration. #26313
  • Implement bare output for dotnet sln list #26303
    Backlog

Closed

  • Why are run and build results completely different #26299

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix dotnet sln add for older 4.7.2 projects wrong configuration #26329
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pick Template Callback to 7.0.100-preview6 #26327
  • Display manifest version inside of workload list #26326
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix typo in string resource #26294
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • implemented in-proc callbacks for dotnet operations #26155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26307
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Add support for RazorLangVersion 7.0 #24383
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update razor-compiler dependencies and re-enable flow #26290
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Log the publish method used when publishing #26287
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Revert to token-per-line response file handling #26204
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 6.0.303
  • upgrade our version of newtonsoft #26288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump NewtonSoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/NewtonSoftDependentProject #26171
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Embedded Language Indicators for raw string literals #6247

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • StackOverflow in Test_Windows_CoreClr_Release CI #62222
  • Rename option "Include overloads" doesn't work #62221
  • Restrict values that trigger "Convert to Utf-8 string" analyzer #62207
  • Stack Trace Explorer Accessibility Insights Fix #62206
  • Read SmartIndent option from IEditorOptions #62204
  • GoToDefinition integration tests failed due to empty file #62188
  • Unused usings not faded #62183
  • API proposal: Expose functionality of `SyntaxGenerator.TypedConstantExpression` via a better method #62181
    Compiler.Next
  • Typo in API name: `ShouldShowItemsFromUnimportNamspaces` #62177

Closed

  • Complete Statement does not work for switch expressions #57213
    17.3
  • `CscCompile_WithSourceCodeRedirectedViaStandardInput_ProducesLibrary` fails locally #61452
    17.3
  • `ConstantValueToStringTest01` fails locally #61450
  • IDE0063 could produce invalid code #58911
    Backlog
  • It seems like a syntax parser bug when combined `switch` statement and a wrong open square bracket `[` token #62126
    17.3
  • Please allow [assembly: TypeForwardedTo(typeof(T))] when T is [Obsolete] #61264
    Compiler.Next
  • Detect `if (x == null) x = ...` and offer to convert to `x ??= ...` #54974
    Backlog
  • Support `if` pattern in "use null coalescing assignment" refactoring #32985
    Backlog
  • TryCalculateRequiredMembers throws exceptions if there's duplicate required members #62062
    17.4
  • Incomplete record inheritance syntax produces a lot of nonsense compiler errors #62051
  • Null coalescing does not work as expected with types that have implicit operators #62184
    17.3
  • IDE0055 (Fix formatting) errors after upgrading to SDK 6.0.300 #61433
    Backlog
  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61977
  • EnC: Allow deleting methods #61678
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Cherry-pick 62053 to release/dev17.3 #62220
    Area-IDE
  • Use the prior cached state for the Razor generator in later runs #62219
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for file-types in SymbolKey. #62218
    Area-IDE
  • Add two more integration tests for InheritanceMargin #62217
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify symbol key creation/resolution for named types #62216
    Area-IDE
  • File types IDE changes #62215
    Area-IDE
  • Migrate FabricBot Tasks to Config-as-Code #62212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Synch handlers with fix #62209
    Area-IDE
  • Use new analyzer/fixer in roslyn #62202
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.4 #62200
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Snap release/dev17.4 to main #62196
    Area-IDE
  • Snap main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62194
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow ref field to ref struct #62186
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.3
  • Make sure spans are valid before trying to get exception regions #62178
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62176
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Update xunit runners to move off Newtonsoft.Json 9.0.1 #62168
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Use VisualStudioWorkspaceImpl to perform navigation for Inheritance margin #62053
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support switch expression in CompleteStatementHandler #62114
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Minor lazy diagnostic info refactoring #62091
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update tests to reflect BCL behavior changes #61456
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Improve trivia handling in use-compound-coalesce. #62205
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow to forward obsolete types without any diagnostics. #62127
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P3
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62203
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #62213
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add elastic space in IDE0063 codefix #59383
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Update issue link for a workaround in source #59512
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Don't include [Skip-SymbolCheck] in insertions #62211
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Snap main to release/dev17.3 #62195
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix typo #62192
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update PublishData.json for 17.3p3 snap #62198
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update 'use coalece assignment' fixer to support additional common use case. #62191
    Area-IDE, 17.3 P3
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62190
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.3 P3
  • Revert "Read syntax tree, source text and options synchronously in command handlers" #62189
    Area-IDE, 17.3 P3
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62185
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.3 P3
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62182
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.3 P3
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62180
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.3 P3
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62175
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.3 P3
  • Handle error scenarios with duplicate required fields #62172
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P3
  • Update ref fields status #62167
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P3
  • Add LegacyGlobalOptionsWorkspaceService for OmniSharp EA #62163
    Area-IDE, 17.3 P3
  • Avoid intermediary array allocation in incremental generator #62100
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P3
  • Avoid cascading diagnostics on error base type #62087
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P3
  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61943
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense, 17.3 P3

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62223
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use BackgroundWorkIndicator for Rename Command Handler #61906
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust caching logic when a `NodeStateTable` is empty #62068
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Allow BatchNodes to reuse prior computed arrays if they would generate hte same value #62169
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62164
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reuse incremental states from prior runs if they are unchanged #62116
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix invalid cast when removing unreachable code in top-level programs #61830
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Verify files are saved after a save operation #62117
    Area-IDE
  • Highlight the search term in the options page #61301
    Area-IDE
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Cover module naming style under class #62141
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Pool arrays in the incremental generator #62132
    Area-Compilers
  • Correctly set the VS.Core.Version property #58799
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • State Machine EnC follow-up #62170
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unused value assignment lambda capture case #62057
    Area-IDE
  • Handle possible null symbols in `getAttributeTarget` #62137
    Area-Compilers
  • Track used local constants in attributes #62158
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [EnC] Support more symbol deletes #62151
    Area-Compilers
  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61869
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • EnC: Log more info to in-memory buffer to simplify dump analysis #62070
    Area-Interactive
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #62171
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Parameters from body or forms should not be generated as OpenApiParameters #42483
  • Set description for OpenApiResponse #42482
  • Authentication/Authorization API changes for preview.7 #42481
    7.0-preview7
  • Howto call Azure AD B2C Change Password profile from Blazor WASM #42479
  • Clean up output spew when creating token and secret for the first time #42474
    7.0-preview7
  • Set OpenApiSecurityRequirement for local JWT bearer-based scenarios #42473
    7.0-preview7
  • ClientAssets package beta not behaving as expected #42472
  • Change status code 200 to 204 for DefaultApiConventions.Delete #42468
  • Add status code attribute 409 Conflict to DefaultApiConventions.Post #42467
  • CORS setting in asp.net core 6.0 is not restricting the origins #42463
  • API stop working in ASP core 6 after adding new ConsumesAttribute("application/json") angular project #42462
  • SignalR Client connection is very slow when adding kestrel section to appsettings.json file and setting https or http url. #42461

Closed

  • Add `blazorwasm` Template Baseline Tests #42267
    7.0-preview7
  • Virtualize should allow customization of the spacer element type #42206
    7.0-preview7
  • Root-level virtualization incompatible with overflow-y:scroll on html/body elements #37659
    7.0-preview7
  • Move OpenAPI extension methods to M.A.Builder namespace #42445
    7.0-preview7
  • Set `DefaultScheme` in configuration from user-jwts tool #42453
    7.0-preview6
  • Fix reading scheme-specific options from config #42454
    7.0-preview6
  • Better error for "Attempting to return wrong pooled instance" #42433
  • Blazor app is not working with custom extension in URL @page #42436
  • Change DefaultFiles/DirectoryBrowser/StaticFileMiddleware to only no-op if there's an active endpoint with a non-null RequestDelegate #42413
    7.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Add File Id to IBrowserFile Interface #42480
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] Fix newtonsoft alerts #42478
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.8
  • Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42477
    area-infrastructure
  • Cleanup CommonLibTests.vcxproj #42476
    area-runtime

entry.content:

Created
